tokens.name: focus-ring-width
tokens.semanticMeaning: Default focus ring width - WCAG 2.2 requires minimum 2px
tokens.description: Focus ring width 0.125rem. WCAG 2.2 requires minimum 2px for visibility.

never: Remove focus rings without alternative indicator

tokens.name: focus-ring-color
tokens.semanticMeaning: Focus ring color - inherits from semantic ring token
tokens.description: Focus ring color. Uses semantic ring token for theme consistency.

tokens.name: focus-ring
tokens.semanticMeaning: Default focus ring - suitable for most interactive elements
tokens.description: Default focus ring - suitable for most interactive elements. Width: 0.125rem, Offset: 0.125rem.

do: Use as the default focus indicator
never: Remove without providing alternative focus indicator

tokens.name: focus-outline
tokens.semanticMeaning: CSS outline shorthand for default focus ring
tokens.description: CSS outline value: 0.125rem solid var(--ring). Use with outline-offset: 0.125rem.

tokens.name: focus-offset
tokens.semanticMeaning: Focus ring offset for default style
tokens.description: Focus offset 0.125rem for default focus style.

tokens.name: focus-ring-inset
tokens.semanticMeaning: Inset focus ring - for elements where external ring would be cut off
tokens.description: Inset focus ring - for elements where external ring would be cut off. Width: 0.125rem, Offset: -0.125rem.

do: Use when external ring would be clipped
never: Remove without providing alternative focus indicator

tokens.name: focus-outline-inset
tokens.semanticMeaning: CSS outline shorthand for inset focus ring
tokens.description: CSS outline value: 0.125rem solid var(--ring). Use with outline-offset: -0.125rem.

tokens.name: focus-offset-inset
tokens.semanticMeaning: Focus ring offset for inset style
tokens.description: Focus offset -0.125rem for inset focus style.

tokens.name: focus-ring-thick
tokens.semanticMeaning: Thick focus ring - for high-visibility needs
tokens.description: Thick focus ring - for high-visibility needs. Width: 0.188rem, Offset: 0.125rem.

never: Remove without providing alternative focus indicator

tokens.name: focus-outline-thick
tokens.semanticMeaning: CSS outline shorthand for thick focus ring
tokens.description: CSS outline value: 0.188rem solid var(--ring). Use with outline-offset: 0.125rem.

tokens.name: focus-offset-thick
tokens.semanticMeaning: Focus ring offset for thick style
tokens.description: Focus offset 0.125rem for thick focus style.

tokens.name: focus-ring-subtle
tokens.semanticMeaning: Subtle focus ring - for dense UIs with many focusable elements
tokens.description: Subtle focus ring - for dense UIs with many focusable elements. Width: 0.063rem, Offset: 0.125rem.

never: Remove without providing alternative focus indicator

tokens.name: focus-outline-subtle
tokens.semanticMeaning: CSS outline shorthand for subtle focus ring
tokens.description: CSS outline value: 0.063rem solid var(--ring). Use with outline-offset: 0.125rem.

tokens.name: focus-offset-subtle
tokens.semanticMeaning: Focus ring offset for subtle style
tokens.description: Focus offset 0.125rem for subtle focus style.

tokens.name: focus-within-ring
tokens.semanticMeaning: Focus ring for containers with focused descendants
tokens.description: Focus indicator for containers using :focus-within pseudo-class.

do: Use on containers with focusable children
never: Use as replacement for child focus indicators

tokens.name: focus-high-contrast
tokens.semanticMeaning: Focus ring for Windows High Contrast Mode
tokens.description: High contrast focus ring using system Highlight color.

never: Use custom colors in high contrast
